lessons.description: An overview of data storage in mobile applications, covering the importance of efficient data handling, the types of data storage options available (local vs. remote), and the fundamental principles behind data storage design.
lessons.title: Introduction to Mobile Data Storage

lessons.description: Explore the different types of local databases available for mobile applications, such as SQLite, Core Data, and Realm. Discuss their use cases, advantages, and limitations in mobile system design.
lessons.title: Local Databases: Overview and Use Cases
Designing Scalable Local Databases
lessons.description: Learn strategies for designing scalable local databases that can handle large datasets efficiently. Cover topics such as normalization vs. denormalization, indexing, and data retrieval techniques.

Examine the various data synchronization strategies between local databases and backend servers, including one-way vs. two-way sync, conflict resolution, and the importance of consistency in data synchronization.
lessons.title: Data Synchronization Strategies

lessons.description: Delve into real-time synchronization techniques using technologies such as WebSockets, Firebase, and server-sent events. Discuss their benefits and how to implement them in mobile applications.
lessons.title: Implementing Real-time Synchronization
Caching Strategies in Mobile Applications
lessons.description: Understand the role of caching in mobile applications to improve performance and reduce latency. Discuss common caching strategies, including in-memory caching, disk caching, and cache expiration policies.
Learn how to effectively handle data conflicts during synchronization processes. Cover strategies for merging data, using timestamps, and implementing user-driven conflict resolution.
lessons.title: Handling Data Conflicts in Synchronization
Optimizing Data Storage for Performance
lessons.description: Strategies to optimize data storage for performance in mobile applications. Cover topics such as lazy loading, data serialization, and optimizing queries to enhance user experience.

lessons.title: Security Considerations in Data Storage
lessons.description: Explore security best practices for data storage in mobile applications, including encryption methods, secure storage solutions, and compliance with data protection regulations.

lessons.title: Testing and Debugging Data Storage Solutions
lessons.description: Learn how to effectively test and debug data storage solutions in mobile applications. Cover unit testing, integration testing, and tools for monitoring data integrity and performance.

Discuss emerging trends and technologies in mobile data storage and synchronization, including the rise of cloud databases, advancements in AI-driven data management, and the implications of 5G on data synchronization.
lessons.title: Future Trends in Mobile Data Storage and Synchronization

description: Strategies for designing scalable data storage, local databases, and real-time synchronization with backend servers for mobile applications.
title: Mobile System Design: Data Storage and Synchronization
